text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo @realDonaldTrump is living the life right now because everything that is happening - all this drama and chaos - is exactly what he wanted to deflect from the coronavirus mismanagement and death toll off of his head. Its always been this way. One crisis after another ...
